name: Squirrel Day
description:
Let's get nuts! Climb around the trees, explore the neighborhood, and collect the pecans, acorns, and walnuts in the yards from the viewpoint of a squirrel. Move effortlessly through the branches using your paws to jump and grab. Collect all the nuts as fast as you can and beat your best time.

The full version takes place across multiple neighboring backyards and spans all four seasons, offering dozens of different challenges. Also in the full version, find all of the hidden golden nuts to unlock red and gray squirrels, adding more challenging difficulties.

Features:
-- Unique perspective of a squirrel
-- Thrilling sense of height, speed, and scale
-- Intuitive physics-based movement, climbing, and grabbing controls
-- Non-violent platforming and collecting
-- Single player, no voice chat
